p: T. O. I. carried out the phytochemical, physiochemical, and antidiabetic experiments and supervised. A. I. M. carried out the insecticidal and thin-layer chromatography experiments, and Y. S. M. collected the raw materials and identified the plant. A. M. M. provided technical and financial support and helped in the re-write-up and revision, and T. O. K. wrote the draft manuscript, designed the study, and supervised the project. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
